page.title: 01A description of Chorleywood
page.content: First and foremost Chorleywood is a residential area. Its population is about 11,000 people. The larger part of Chorleywood is in Hertfordshire, the rest is in Buckinghamshire.Shire Lane divides the two. Part of Chorleywood including the common is green belt land and there is some mixed farming in the area.The M25 runs through the outskirts of Chorleywood and the underground railway stops at Chorleywood taking half an hour from Baker St so there is a lot of commuting into London.Chorleywood Common is a well known attraction in the area, some people playing golf there and others going for walks or picnics or watching cricket or football matches played there.Chorleywood has good facilities, including adequate shops,banks,garages schools, a library and many clubs and societies catering for all ages.
